product_name: Sony Sony Action Cam Wrist Strap Mount
long_description: Snow, water, air and land-with the Sony Action Cam wrist strap mount, wherever your wrist goes your Sony wearable camcorder (sold separately) can go too. Convenient, 360deg mount with tiltable angles allows you to adjust your action cam for amazing shots. Durable strap adjusts to securely fit most wrists.
short_description: Snow, water, air and land-with the Sony Action Cam wrist strap mount, wherever your wrist goes your Sony wearable camcorder (sold separately) can go too.
